title: Question:
author: philipma1957
content: Was watching Fox news and they listed all the criminal actions / investigations  that Donald Trump has faced in the last 6 years.So far None of them have stuck to him and I realized The Donald has earned the title “The Teflon Don”Gotti had a good run but they finally got a rap to stick to him.I voted that Donald Trump is more deserving of the nick name.what do you all vote or think.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Well, you are close in names. But you didn't quite make it.For who Trump is, and what he has done, he should take name of Ayn Rand's hero in 'Atlas Shrugged'... John Galt.
